front.title: Use of /127 IPv6 Prefix Length on P2P Links Not Considered Harmful

abstract.t: This document reconsiders the reasons why the use of /127 was regarded as harmful and reevaluates some rationales for using it for IPv6 point-to-point links. This document adheres fundamentally to RFC 3627 [RFC3627]. The main difference is that the use of /127 IPv6 prefix length is no longer considered as harmful.
